name: Unity. Bolt Learning
description:
The game is done in a couple of hours with knowledge of the basic things of Unity

The game was made on the basis of lessons, actually everything works.

When creating, not a single line of code was written! Everything was done using Bolt and its editor, scripts were not even created!

If you have questions about the work of a particular block, how it was done, etc., please contact us in the comments, I hope I can help you :)
